title: Use the forum to post technical questions when you cannot find the answers in the manuals yourself

The information center provides access to the online manuals. It is the most up to date source of information. 14. developerWorks http://www-128.ibm.com/developerworks/db2 This Web site is an excellent resource for developers and DBAs providing access to current articles, tutorials, etc. for free. 15. alphaWorks http://www.alphaworks.ibm.com/ This Web site provides direct access to IBM's emerging technology. It is a place where one can find the latest technologies from IBM
